doc.title: Our Daily Bread
doc.plot: "Our Daily Bread" is a documentary featuring the Freegan movement of New York City. This documentary follows a group of Freegans on a "trash tour" as they reveal how much edible food is thrown away, and how food waste becomes toxic garbage or recycled resources depending on the choices we make. Many people feel uncomfortable about the abundance of garbage our society produces. "Our Daily Bread" takes a close look at the personal and environmental consequences of how we dispose of food waste.
